name: Optimistic
description: A hopeful, positive emotional atmosphere that emphasizes the bright side of situations and maintains faith in positive outcomes.

name: Melancholic
description: A bittersweet, contemplative emotional atmosphere that combines sadness with beauty, often nostalgic or wistful in nature.

name: Tense
description: A high-stress emotional atmosphere characterized by anxiety, anticipation, and nervous energy that keeps audiences on edge.

name: Whimsical
description: A playful, imaginative emotional atmosphere that embraces the fantastical, quirky, and delightfully unexpected.

name: Gritty
description: A raw, unpolished emotional atmosphere that emphasizes harsh realities, urban decay, and unvarnished truth.

name: Ethereal
description: A dreamlike, otherworldly emotional atmosphere that feels light, spiritual, and transcendent of ordinary reality.

name: Energetic
description: A high-energy, dynamic emotional atmosphere characterized by movement, excitement, and vibrant activity.

name: Contemplative
description: A thoughtful, introspective emotional atmosphere that encourages deep thinking, reflection, and philosophical consideration.
